Home Expertise

ICS Solutions

At ICS, we are committed to identifying and addressing some of the most common challenges within logistics and supply chain processes. To achieve this, ICS team has harnessed our first-hand experience in transportation and warehouse management domains to offer a line of unique Dynamics AX / D365FO add-on solutions.

Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations (formerly Dynamics AX) is one of the most advanced and comprehensive ERP products available today. But while its standard functionality may be well sufficient for a lot of companies out there, there are certain industries that rely heavily on customizations of their Dynamics system in order to overcome certain limitations of the standard version.

Over the years ICS team has completed many ERP implementations and customizations for customers in the logistics and production industries, and through collaboration with end-user companies we have identified some key common challenges that businesses in these sectors face in their daily operations. The result of this work is our portfolio of vertical add-on solutions that seamlessly integrate to the Dynamics 365FO or Dynamics AX 2012 R3 environment and further extend their functionality with some unique features and tools.

Even though our solutions were developed with logistics and production companies in mind, they will be indispensable to any business that owns a fleet of vehicles for goods transportation and/or a warehouse for their storage and uses Dynamics AX/365FO as its chosen ERP platform.

ICS Solutions for Microsoft Dynamics 365

  • Transportation Package
  • Warehouse Package
  • SC Execution Package
  • Monitoring tool
  • Inventory Optimization Package
  • Demand Forecasting Package
All Solutions

Porini 365 ERP

International Fashion & Apparel Solution for Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations

PORINI 365 ERP for Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a vertical solution designed for the fashion, retail, footwear and textile sector, based on Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations, the cutting edge of innovation for the business of your company. The solution addresses the need of the fashion business while defining in a very efficient way seasonal products that decline in a high number of variations. It allows you to define code structures, code templates and attach to it technical and commercial data specific to the product category.

Learn more
Learn more

Porini 563 ERP

International Fashion & Apparel Solution for Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations

PORINI 563 ERP for Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a vertical solution designed for the fashion, retail, footwear and textile sector, based on Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Operations, the cutting edge of innovation for the business of your company. The solution addresses the need of the fashion business while defining in a very efficient way seasonal products that decline in a high number of variations. It allows you to define code structures, code templates and attach to it technical and commercial data specific to the product category.

Services

Solution-specific Services

Solution-specific Services

Custom Development Services

We realize that every business has its own unique business processes and requirements. Therefore, we will happily customize our solutions to meet your specific needs. Our developers will work with you every step of the way to ensure a quick delivery of customizations and a smooth integration of the end product with your existing system.

Consulting Services

ICS consultants and business analysts have profound knowledge and deep understanding of processes in the logistics and warehouse management sectors. You can always count on them for help in defining requirements, formalizing business processes, creating functional specifications and selecting implementation scenarios and project methodology.

Support Services

We have highly qualified support staff onboard to help our customers ensure consistent operation of our solutions. This is achieved through proven workflows and communication processes, timely provision of the necessary technical knowledge and short ramp-up periods to reduce delays. Combined with our state-of-the-art development services, in-depth industry expertise and well-organized delivery process, this guarantees prompt and efficient response to all client queries.

Drop us a line

Our services are designed to resolve your ERP issues in the most effective and direct way possible.
